result.purpose: This folder contains React components that make up the home section of a web application, including a main home component, an introduction component, and a typewriter effect component.
result.architecture: The folder follows a component-based architecture typical of React applications, where each file represents a distinct UI component with its own functionality and styling.

src/components/Home/Home.js.purpose: This file defines a React component that serves as the home section of a web application.
side_effects: Imports and displays images and other components

src/components/Home/Home2.js.purpose: This file defines a React component that displays a personal introduction and social media links.
side_effects: Renders a component with social media links and an avatar image.
risks: External links may lead to untrusted sites.

src/components/Home/Type.js.purpose: This file defines a React component that displays a typewriter effect with various strings.
